snippet: Newt Gingrich charged that remarks he made about food stamps and African-Americans were taken out of context and twisted to sound racially insensitive.
abstract: Newt Gingrich charged that remarks he made about food stamps and African-Americans were taken out of context and twisted to sound racially insensitive.
lead_paragraph: NEWPORT, N.H. -- Newt Gingrich charged that remarks he made about food stamps and African-Americans were taken out of context and twisted to sound racially insensitive.

headline.main: Gingrich Pushes Back Against Charges of Racism

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: National Assn for the Advancement of Colored People
